mdRecord.dcterms:title: Still wie die Nacht = Still as the night : altdeutscher Liebesreim : op. 326, no. 27 / Carl Bohm ; English version by Mrs. John P. Morgan of New York
Still as the night
Still as the night, deep as the sea
Still wie die Nacht, tief wie das Meer
Bohm, Carl, 1844-1920. Lieder. op. 326. English & German. Still wie die Nacht. English & German

mdRecord.dcterms:description: Publication date derived from form of publisher's name. Cf. Handbook of early American sheet music / Dichter and Shapiro.

Advertisement on p. [2]: C.A. White's latest vocal and instrumental compositions. On p. [6]: Musical incipits for: By the autumn sea / John Wiegand ; Arab love song / Geo. H. Hayes ; My Alpine rose / Alfred La Brie ; Serenade / John Wiegand ; I come! / Louis Campbell-Tipton.
